## Intro ggplot

```{r}
ggplot(
  data = mtcars, 
  mapping = aes(x = disp, y = mpg)
  ) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(se = TRUE) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", colour = "red", se = FALSE)

```

```{r}
gg1 <-   ggplot(data = mtcars, mapping = aes(x = disp, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point()

gg2 <-   ggplot(data = mtcars) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = disp, y = mpg))

ggarrange(gg1, gg2, labels = c("mapping = aes in ggplot", "mapping = aes in geom_*"),
          nrow = 1)
```


```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = mtcars, mapping = aes(x = disp, y = mpg))
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = mtcars, mapping = aes(x = disp, y = mpg, colour = factor(cyl), size = qsec))
```

```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_point(
    mapping = aes(x = disp, y = mpg,
                  size = factor(cyl),
                  shape = factor(cyl),
                  shape = factor(cyl),
                  ),
    colour = "blue",
    data = mtcars
  )
```

```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_point(
    mapping = aes(x = disp, y = mpg,
                  colour = factor(am),
                  size = qsec,
                  shape = factor(cyl),
                  ),
    data = mtcars
  )
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = mtcars,
             mapping = aes
             (x = disp,
              y = mpg, 
              colour = factor(cyl), 
              alpha = 3.6*(0.25*1609.347)/qsec,
              shape = factor(ifelse(am, "Man", "Aut"))
              ), 
             size = 4
             ) +
            labs(
              colour = "cyl", 
              alpha = "speed\n(km/h)", 
              shape = "trans-\nmission"
              )
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = mtcars,
             mapping = aes
             (x = disp,
              y = mpg, 
              colour = factor(cyl), 
              alpha = 3.6*(0.25*1609.347)/qsec,

              ), 
             size = 4
             ) +
            labs(
              colour = "cyl", 
              alpha = "speed\n(km/h)", 
              shape = "trans-\nmission",

              span = 0,5

```

```{r}
ggplot(
  data = mtcars, 
  mapping = aes(
    x = disp, 
    y = mpg
    )
  ) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(
    method = "lm", 
    se = FALSE
    ) +
  # robust lm
  geom_smooth(
    method = MASS::rlm, 
    colour = 'Red', 
    se = FALSE
    )
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_point(
    data = mtcars,
    mapping = aes(
      x = disp,
      y = mpg, 
      colour = factor(cyl), 
      size = 3.6*(0.25*1609.347)/qsec, 
      shape = factor(
        # Note codeing am
        # 0 automatic, 1 manual
        ifelse(
          am, 
          "Aut", 
          "Man"
          )
        )
      )
    ) +
  labs(
    colour = "cyl", 
    size = "speed\n(km/h)", 
    shape = "trans-\nmission"
    ) +
  geom_smooth(
    data = mtcars, 
    mapping = aes(x = disp, y = mpg)
    )
```
